"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556ab0be6368720413f61000#post_556ab0be6368720413f61000
Well, the Quincies are back. And they're evil. Uryu is working for them. They have a king. His name is Ywhach. His plan is to kill the Soul King and destroy creation. Ichigo is actually half quincie. Some of the Espada survived. Neliel, Grimmjow, and Tia.
